attributes.action: More car parking spaces for the surestart children's centre london rd tilbury
attributes.additional_details: There are only 12 spaces for the 40 members of staff for the sure start centre , this is because the council sold the rest to developers . This leaves them and all the users no where to park but to fill up London road and other nearby roads making congestion a nightmare on these roads , leaving residents no where to park them selfs . Please help make the council realise this and provide a bigger car park .
